8 double LinePointsReducer::GetPerpendicularDistance(const RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint &pt, const RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint &lineStart, const RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint &lineEnd)
9 {
10  double dx = lineEnd.first - lineStart.first;
11  double dy = lineEnd.second - lineStart.second;
12 
13  //Normalise
14  double mag = pow(pow(dx,2.0)+pow(dy,2.0),0.5);
15  if(mag > 0.0)
16  {
17  dx /= mag; dy /= mag;
18  }
19 
20  double pvx = pt.first - lineStart.first;
21  double pvy = pt.second - lineStart.second;
22 
23  //Get dot product (project pv onto normalized direction)
24  double pvdot = dx * pvx + dy * pvy;
25 
26  //Scale line direction vector
27  double dsx = pvdot * dx;
28  double dsy = pvdot * dy;
29 
30  //Subtract this from pv
31  double ax = pvx - dsx;
32  double ay = pvy - dsy;
33 
34  return pow(pow(ax,2.0)+pow(ay,2.0),0.5);
35 }
36 
37 void LinePointsReducer::ApplyRamerDouglasPeucker(const vector<RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint> &pointList, double epsilon, vector<RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint> &out)
38 {
39  if(pointList.size()<2)
40  throw invalid_argument("Not enough points to simplify");
41 
42  // Find the point with the maximum distance from line between start and end
43  double dmax = 0.0;
44  size_t index = 0;
45  size_t end = pointList.size()-1;
46  for(size_t i = 1; i < end; i++)
47  {
48  double d = GetPerpendicularDistance(pointList[i], pointList[0], pointList[end]);
49  if (d > dmax)
50  {
51  index = i;
52  dmax = d;
53  }
54  }
55 
56  // If max distance is greater than epsilon, recursively simplify
57  if(dmax > epsilon)
58  {
59  // Recursive call
60  vector<RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint> recResults1;
61  vector<RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint> recResults2;
62  vector<RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint> firstLine(pointList.begin(), pointList.begin()+index+1);
63  vector<RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint> lastLine(pointList.begin()+index, pointList.end());
64  ApplyRamerDouglasPeucker(firstLine, epsilon, recResults1);
65  ApplyRamerDouglasPeucker(lastLine, epsilon, recResults2);
66 
67  // Build the result list
68  out.assign(recResults1.begin(), recResults1.end()-1);
69  out.insert(out.end(), recResults2.begin(), recResults2.end());
70  if(out.size()<2)
71  throw runtime_error("Problem assembling output");
72  }
73  else
74  {
75  //Just return start and end points
76  out.clear();
77  out.push_back(pointList[0]);
78  out.push_back(pointList[end]);
79  }
80 }

82 void LinePointsReducer::SetMaxDistance(double max_distance)
83 {
84  max_distance_ = max_distance;
85 }

87 void LinePointsReducer::SetContainers(vector<line_follower::PointAndDirection>left_line, vector<line_follower::PointAndDirection>right_line)
88 {
89  for(auto &it: left_line)
90  {
91  left_line_points_.push_back(RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint(double(it.x),double(it.y)));
92  }
93 
94  for(auto &it: right_line)
95  {
96  right_line_points_.push_back(RamerDouglasPeuckerTypePoint(double(it.x),double(it.y)));
97  }
98 }

100 void LinePointsReducer::ClearMemory()
101 {
102 
103  left_line_is_reduced_ = false;
104  right_line_is_reduced_ = false;
105 
106  left_line_points_.clear();
107  right_line_points_.clear();
108  left_line_points_reduced_.clear();
109  right_line_points_reduced_.clear();
110 
111  left_line_points_reduced_length_direction_.clear();
112  right_line_points_reduced_length_direction_.clear();
113 }

115 void LinePointsReducer::DrawReducedLinePoints(Mat &rgb, int line)
116 {
117  if(line == LEFT_LINE)
118  {
119  for(auto &it: left_line_points_reduced_)
120  {
121  circle(rgb, Point((int)it.first,(int)it.second), 7, Scalar(0, 255, 255));
122  }
123  }
124 
125  if(line == RIGHT_LINE)
126  {
127  for(auto &it: right_line_points_reduced_)
128  {
129  circle(rgb, Point((int)it.first,(int)it.second), 7, Scalar(255, 255, 0));
130  }
131  }
132 }

135 LinePointsReducerReturnInfo LinePointsReducer::GetReturnInfo()
136 {
137  return LinePointsReducerReturnInfo{left_line_is_reduced_,
138  left_line_points_reduced_.size(),
139  right_line_is_reduced_,
140  right_line_points_reduced_.size()};
141 }

143 LinePointsReducerReturnInfo LinePointsReducer::ReduceLinePoints(vector<line_follower::PointAndDirection> left_line, vector<line_follower::PointAndDirection> right_line, double max_distance)
144 {
145 
146  ClearMemory();
147  SetContainers(left_line,right_line);
148  SetMaxDistance(max_distance);
149 
150 
151 
152  if(left_line_points_.size() >= 2)
153  {
154  ApplyRamerDouglasPeucker(left_line_points_, max_distance_, left_line_points_reduced_);
155  ComputeLengthAndDirectionFromConsecutiveReducedLinePoints(LEFT_LINE);
156  left_line_is_reduced_ = true;
157  }
158  else
159  {
160  left_line_is_reduced_ = false;
161  }
162 
163  if(right_line_points_.size() >= 2)
164  {
165  ApplyRamerDouglasPeucker(right_line_points_, max_distance_, right_line_points_reduced_);
166  ComputeLengthAndDirectionFromConsecutiveReducedLinePoints(RIGHT_LINE);
167  right_line_is_reduced_ = true;
168  }
169  else
170  {
171  right_line_is_reduced_ = false;
172  }
173 
174 
175  return GetReturnInfo();
176 
177 }

179 void LinePointsReducer::GetReducedLinePoints(vector<ReducedPoints> &line_points_reduced, int line)
180 {
181  if(line == LEFT_LINE)
182  {
183  for(auto &it: left_line_points_reduced_)
184  {
185  line_points_reduced.push_back(ReducedPoints{int(it.first),int(it.second)});
186  }
187  }
188 
189  if(line == RIGHT_LINE)
190  {
191  for(auto &it: right_line_points_reduced_)
192  {
193  line_points_reduced.push_back(ReducedPoints{int(it.first),int(it.second)});
194  }
195  }
196 }

198 void LinePointsReducer::GetLengthAndDirectionFromConsecutiveReducedLinePoints(vector<PointInDirection> &line_points_reduced_length_direction, int line)
199 {
200  if(line == LEFT_LINE)
201  {
202  for(auto &it: left_line_points_reduced_length_direction_)

206  }

208  if(line == RIGHT_LINE)
209  {
210  for(auto &it: right_line_points_reduced_length_direction_)

217 void LinePointsReducer::ComputeLengthAndDirectionFromConsecutiveReducedLinePoints(int line)
218 {
219 
220  if(line == LEFT_LINE)
221  {
222  for(auto i=0; i<left_line_points_reduced_.size()-1; i++)
223  {
224  int x = left_line_points_reduced_[i].first;
225  int y = left_line_points_reduced_[i].second;
226 
227  int x_next = left_line_points_reduced_[i+1].first;
228  int y_next = left_line_points_reduced_[i+1].second;
229 
230  int opposite = y - y_next;
231  int adjacent = x_next - x;
232 
233  int length = sqrt(pow(adjacent,2)+pow(opposite,2));
234 
235  float angle = CalculateAngle4Quadrants(opposite, adjacent) ;
236 
237  left_line_points_reduced_length_direction_.push_back(PointInDirection{x,y,length, angle});
238  }
239  }
240 
241  if(line == RIGHT_LINE)
242  {
243  for(auto i=0; i<right_line_points_reduced_.size()-1; i++)
244  {
245  int x = right_line_points_reduced_[i].first;
246  int y = right_line_points_reduced_[i].second;
247 
248  int x_next = right_line_points_reduced_[i+1].first;
249  int y_next = right_line_points_reduced_[i+1].second;
250 
251  int opposite = y - y_next;
252  int adjacent = x_next - x;
253 
254  int length = sqrt(pow(adjacent,2)+pow(opposite,2));
255 
256  float angle = CalculateAngle4Quadrants(opposite, adjacent) ;
257 
258  right_line_points_reduced_length_direction_.push_back(PointInDirection{x,y,length, angle});
259  }
260  }
261 }

264 void LinePointsReducer::CoutLengthAndDirectionFromConsecutiveReducedLinePoints()
265 {
266  cout << "___LinePointsReducer LengthAndDirectionFromConsecutiveReducedLinePoints___" << endl;
267  for (auto &it : left_line_points_reduced_length_direction_)
268  {
269  cout <<"left: \tPoint("<< it.x << "," << it.y << ") \tDirection: " << it.angle << "° \tLength: " << it.length <<"px" << endl;
270  }
271 
272 
273  for (auto &it : right_line_points_reduced_length_direction_)
274  {
275  cout <<"right: \tPoint("<< it.x << "," << it.y << ") \tDirection: " << it.angle << "° \tLength: " << it.length <<"px" << endl;
276  }
277  cout << "#######################################" << endl;
278 }
